welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Candiac, Canada! Known for its charming small-town feel and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at St Hubert Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Jean Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
